s1.title: Introduction
s1.p: This is the Excalibur XConf File Converter package which contains a tool for converting between container configuration files.
Using XFC it's possible to convert your older ECM configuration files into a format understood, for example, by Fortress.
XFC consists of several packages that define a generic model for component definitions and an input/output module interface for supporting conversions between specific containers.
